Key Match Events: High-pressure encounter with both teams being crowd favorites and an electric atmosphere expected
Pre-Game Insights: Reece Topley predicted a 'cauldron' atmosphere due to the expected high support from fans for both teams.
The pitch in Saint Lucia has been high-scoring and is expected to aid batters.
West Indies captain Rovman Powell praised spinner Akeal Hosein for his performance and highlighted the importance of Nicholas Pooran's power-hitting form.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The teams have met 29 times in T20 history, with West Indies leading 17-12.
The match is set to be played in an electric atmosphere with a mix of local and English fans.
